oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Model 1917 United States helmet
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: World War I helmet, 30th Division (Old Hickory Division) with intact lining. The initials K. R. have been carved into the strap, by Musician Kenneth G. Redford, HQ Co., 114 FA, 30th Div. The 30th Divison insignia is painted on the front. There is a rough texture covering the helmet from sand added to the paint to reduce glare. Often the division insignia was painted on after the war. The Old Hickory Division was composed on men from Tennessee, North and South Carolina.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: World War, 1914-1918; World War, 1914-1918 - History
